## Using ITables

You can use `itables` in
[Quarto HTML](https://quarto.org/docs/reference/formats/html.html) documents.

It works exactly the same way as for your Jupyter notebooks.

```{python}
from itables import init_notebook_mode
from itables.sample_dfs import get_countries
import itables.options as opt


init_notebook_mode(all_interactive=True)

opt.style = 'data-quarto-disable-processing="true"'
```

## A sample dataframe

```{python}
get_countries(html=False)
```

## A complex dataframe

```{python}
get_countries()
```
